title: Team Hierarchy
description: This schema defines the Team entity with Hierarchy. Hierarchical teams are supported `Organization` -> `BusinessUnit` -> `Division` -> `Department` -> `Group`.

name.description: A unique name of the team typically the team ID from an identity provider. Example - group Id from LDAP.

displayName.description: Name used for display purposes. Example 'Data Science team'.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

children.description: Children teams. An `Organization` can have `BusinessUnit`, `Division` or `Department` as children. A `BusinessUnit` can have `BusinessUnit`, `Division`, or `Department` as children. A `Division` can have `Division` or `Department` as children. A `Department` can have `Department` as children.

isJoinable.description: Can any user join this team during sign up? Value of true indicates yes, and false no.
